TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataGridBoolColumn extends System.Windows.Forms.DataGridColumnStyle

summary.span: 指定一列，该列中每个单元格均包含一个表示布尔值的复选框。

span.span: Specifies a column in which each cell contains a check box for representing a Boolean value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生自 `abstract` 类 。The derives from the `abstract` class . 在运行时，默认情况下， 的每个单元格中都包含复选框：选中（`true`）、未选中（`false`）和 。At run time, the contains check boxes in each cell that have three states by default: checked (`true`), unchecked (`false`), and . 若要使用双状态复选框，请将 属性设置为 `false`。To use two-state check boxes, set the property to `false`. 添加到类的属性包括 、和 。Properties added to the class include , , and . 这些属性指定列的每个状态的基础值。These properties specify the value underlying each of the column's states. ## Examples 下面的代码示例首先创建一个新的 ，并将其添加到 的 。The following code example first creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-cpp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CPP/boolcolumn.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/CS/boolcolumn.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataGridBoolColumn overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DataGridBoolColumn overview/VB/boolcolumn.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取单元格的最佳宽度和高度，此单元格包含特定值。

span.span: Gets the optimum width and height of a cell given a specific value to contain.

returns.span: 一个包含单元格绘制信息的 。

span.span: A that contains the drawing information for the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法允许您根据所显示的值调整列的大小。The method allows you to resize the column based on the value displayed. 例如，如果单元格包含一个特别大的值，则可以使用 方法根据值返回该单元格的最佳大小。For example, if a cell contains an especially large value, you can use the method to return the optimum size of the cell based on the value. 最佳大小不仅会考虑字符串的大小，还会考虑用于显示字符串的字体。The optimum size takes into account not only the size of the string, but also the font used to display it.
